Pedagogical Masks

Masks for teaching and theatre exploration. For a really genuine Neutral Mask, the only place you can get it is from Sarah Sartori - visit sartorimaskmuseum.it and find their contact details - but to meet demand I have designed my own versions, which are mainly what you will see below. For those, contact me.

The Neutral mask is a cornerstone of the physical theatre training developed by Jacques Lecoq. For more on my understanding of the design and use of the Neutral mask and my choices with my version, click here.
